trans-unit.source: Documenting Your Code with XML (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: 使用 XML (Visual Basic 中) 将代码文档化 |Microsoft 文档

trans-unit.source: Documenting Your Code with XML (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: 使用 XML 将代码文档化 (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)], you can document your code using XML
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]，您可以记录使用 XML 将代码

trans-unit.source: XML Documentation Comments
trans-unit.target: XML 文档注释

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] provides an easy way to automatically create XML documentation for projects.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]提供了一种简单的方法来自动创建项目的 XML 文档。

trans-unit.source: You can automatically generate an XML skeleton for your types and members, and then provide summaries, descriptive documentation for each parameter, and other remarks.
trans-unit.target: 您可以自动生成的 XML 主干的类型和成员，，然后提供摘要、 描述性文档每个参数，并将其他备注。

trans-unit.source: With the appropriate setup, the XML documentation is automatically emitted into an XML file with the same name as your project and the .xml extension.
trans-unit.target: 与相应的安装程序，到 XML 文件与您的项目和.xml 扩展名同名自动发出 XML 文档。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [/doc](../../../visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/doc.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[/doc](../../../visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/doc.md)。

trans-unit.source: The XML file can be consumed or otherwise manipulated as XML.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用或其他操作以 XML 形式的 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: This file is located in the same directory as the output .exe or .dll file of your project.
trans-unit.target: 此文件位于您的项目的输出.exe 或.dll 文件所在的目录中。

trans-unit.source: XML documentation starts with `'''`.
trans-unit.target: XML 文档开头`'''`。

trans-unit.source: The processing of these comments has some restrictions:
trans-unit.target: 这些注释的处理有一些限制︰

trans-unit.source: The documentation must be well-formed XML.
trans-unit.target: 文档必须是格式正确 XML。

trans-unit.source: If the XML is not well formed, a warning is generated and the documentation file contains a comment saying that an error was encountered.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XML 的格式不正确，则会生成警告和文档文件将包含条注释，指出遇到错误。

trans-unit.source: Developers are free to create their own set of tags.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可以随意创建其自己的标记集。

trans-unit.source: There is a recommended set of tags (see "Related Sections" in this topic).
trans-unit.target: 没有一组建议的标记 （请参见本主题中的"相关章节"）。

trans-unit.source: Some of the recommended tags have special meanings:
trans-unit.target: 建议的标记的一些具有特殊含义︰

trans-unit.source: The \<param> tag is used to describe parameters.
trans-unit.target: \<Param&1;> 标记用来描述的参数。

trans-unit.source: If used, the compiler will verify that the parameter exists and that all parameters are described in the documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用，编译器将验证该参数存在并在文档中描述了所有参数。

trans-unit.source: If the verification fails, the compiler issues a warning.
trans-unit.target: 如果验证失败，编译器会发出警告。

trans-unit.source: The `cref` attribute can be attached to any tag to provide a reference to a code element.
trans-unit.target: `cref`属性可以附加到任何标记，以提供对代码元素的引用。

trans-unit.source: The compiler verifies that this code element exists.
trans-unit.target: 编译器将验证存在此代码元素。

trans-unit.source: If the verification fails, the compiler issues a warning.
trans-unit.target: 如果验证失败，编译器会发出警告。

trans-unit.source: The compiler also respects any `Imports` statements when looking for a type described in the `cref` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 编译器还将考虑所有`Imports`语句在查找中描述的类型时`cref`属性。

trans-unit.source: The \<summary> tag is used by IntelliSense in [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](../../../csharp/includes/vsprvs_md.md)] to display additional information about a type or member.
trans-unit.target: \<摘要&1;> IntelliSense 中将使用标记[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](../../../csharp/includes/vsprvs_md.md)]以显示有关类型或成员的其他信息。

trans-unit.source: Related Sections
trans-unit.target: 相关章节

trans-unit.source: For details on creating an XML file with documentation comments, see the following topics:
trans-unit.target: 有关创建带有文档注释的 XML 文件的详细信息，请参阅以下主题︰

trans-unit.source: [/doc](../../../visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/doc.md)
trans-unit.target: [/doc](../../../visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/doc.md)

trans-unit.source: [XML Comment Tags](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/xmldoc/recommended-xml-tags-for-documentation-comments.md)
trans-unit.target: [XML 注释标记](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/xmldoc/recommended-xml-tags-for-documentation-comments.md)

trans-unit.source: [Processing the XML File](../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/program-structure/processing-the-xml-file.md)
trans-unit.target: [处理 XML 文件](../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/program-structure/processing-the-xml-file.md)

trans-unit.source: [How to: Create XML Documentation](../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/program-structure/how-to-create-xml-documentation.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何：创建 XML 文档](../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/program-structure/how-to-create-xml-documentation.md)

trans-unit.source: [XML Tools in Visual Studio](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/xml-tools/xml-tools-in-visual-studio)
trans-unit.target: [Visual Studio 中的 XML 工具](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/xml-tools/xml-tools-in-visual-studio)

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: 另请参阅

trans-unit.source: [Developing Applications with Visual Basic](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/index.md)
trans-unit.target: [使用 Visual Basic 开发应用程序](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/index.md)

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic Programming Guide](../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/index.md)
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic 编程指南](../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/index.md)
